sourcesContent:
import { Box } from "@material-ui/core";
import React from "react";
import Body from "../Typography/Body";
import Title from "../Typography/Title";
import Caption from "../Typography/Caption";

function Info({ ...projectInfo }) {
    return (
        <>
            <Box>
                <Title>Project Info</Title>
            </Box>
            <Box>
                <Caption>Client</Caption>
            </Box>
            <Box pt={2}>
                <Body>{projectInfo.client}</Body>
            </Box>
            <Box>
                <Caption>Date</Caption>
            </Box>
            <Box pt={2}>
                <Body>{projectInfo.date}</Body>
            </Box>
            <Box>
                <Caption>Director</Caption>
            </Box>
            <Box pt={2}>
                <Body>{projectInfo.director}</Body>
            </Box>
            <Box>
                <Caption>Actors</Caption>
            </Box>
            <Box pt={2}>
                <Caption>{projectInfo && projectInfo.actors.map((a, key) => (

                    <Body key={key}>{a}</Body>

                ))}</Caption>
            </Box>



        </>
    );
}


export default Info;
